title: Bert Accidentally Exposed His Fiancée's *WHAT?!*
description:
Bert and his fiancée rarely get to spend a lot of time together. But over the weekend, they got to spend every day together, and Bert made sure to enjoy every moment.
He was so excited about their weekend that he posted a few highlights online. However, he didn't notice something about one of the pictures until it was too late!
